english.segment1: beauty for ashes. life evermore. peace beyond measures. jesus won it all
english.segment2: saved out of darkness. cleansed by his blood. into his kingdom. by the power of god
english.segment4: he has won it, my salvation. my forgiveness, at the cross. he is healing, he's redemption. for whoever would come. he has won, that's the cross
english.segment5: all can take freely. water of life. let all who thirst, come. worship jesus christ
english.segment7: he has won it, my salvation. my forgiveness, at the cross. he is healing, he's redemption. for whoever would come. he has won, that's the cross
english.segment8: for in him is the life. that destroyed sin and death. and he broke every chain. for the bound and oppressed
